pullrequest.title: Update to ignition citadel dependencies, c++17, cmake 3.10

content.raw:
`HAVE_IGNITION_FUEL_TOOLS` is still used in `gazebo/gui`, did you mean to also remove it from there?

~~~
$ grep -r "HAVE_IGNITION_FUEL" gazebo/
gazebo/gui/InsertModelWidgetPrivate.hh:#ifdef HAVE_IGNITION_FUEL_TOOLS
gazebo/gui/InsertModelWidgetPrivate.hh:#ifdef HAVE_IGNITION_FUEL_TOOLS
gazebo/gui/InsertModelWidgetPrivate.hh:#ifdef HAVE_IGNITION_FUEL_TOOLS
gazebo/gui/InsertModelWidget.cc:#ifdef HAVE_IGNITION_FUEL_TOOLS
gazebo/gui/InsertModelWidget.cc:#ifndef HAVE_IGNITION_FUEL_TOOLS
gazebo/gui/InsertModelWidget.cc:#ifdef HAVE_IGNITION_FUEL_TOOLS
gazebo/gui/InsertModelWidget.cc:#ifdef HAVE_IGNITION_FUEL_TOOLS
gazebo/gui/InsertModelWidget.cc:#ifdef  HAVE_IGNITION_FUEL_TOOLS
~~~
content.html:
HAVE_IGNITION_FUEL_TOOLS is still used in gazebo/gui, did you mean to also remove it from there?

$ grep -r "HAVE_IGNITION_FUEL" gazebo/
gazebo/gui/InsertModelWidgetPrivate.hh:#ifdef HAVE_IGNITION_FUEL_TOOLS
gazebo/gui/InsertModelWidgetPrivate.hh:#ifdef HAVE_IGNITION_FUEL_TOOLS
gazebo/gui/InsertModelWidgetPrivate.hh:#ifdef HAVE_IGNITION_FUEL_TOOLS
gazebo/gui/InsertModelWidget.cc:#ifdef HAVE_IGNITION_FUEL_TOOLS
gazebo/gui/InsertModelWidget.cc:#ifndef HAVE_IGNITION_FUEL_TOOLS
gazebo/gui/InsertModelWidget.cc:#ifdef HAVE_IGNITION_FUEL_TOOLS
gazebo/gui/InsertModelWidget.cc:#ifdef HAVE_IGNITION_FUEL_TOOLS
gazebo/gui/InsertModelWidget.cc:#ifdef  HAVE_IGNITION_FUEL_TOOLS
